title: India's power consumption rises 3.5 pc to 145.40 billion units in July
description: India's power consumption in July increased by 3.5% to 145.40 Billion Units from the previous year, as cooling demands eased due to rainfall. The peak power demand on a single day also rose to 226.63GW from 208.95GW last July, though it remained below the 250.20GW record set in May 2024.
